alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Russell County through 645 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few strong thunderstorms 7 miles north of Russell, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, deadly lightning, locally very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lucas, Gorham, Luray, Paradise and Waldo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
